title: Help Center

startRegistration.question: How do I start my marriage registration?
startRegistration.answer: Sign up for an account, complete the onboarding process, and then start your application from the dashboard.

documents.question: What documents do I need?
documents.answer: You will need: National ID (front and back), passport-sized photos (2 copies), birth certificate, and previous marriage certificate if applicable.

processTime.question: How long does the process take?
processTime.answer: Typically, the registration process takes 7-14 business days after submission of all required documents.

reschedule.question: Can I reschedule my appointment?
reschedule.answer: Yes, you can reschedule your appointment from the Appointments page up to 24 hours before your scheduled time.

getInTouch: Get in touch with our support team
